scripts.build:commonjs: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs babel src --out-dir lib -s --ignore test --copy-files
scripts.build:es: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es babel src --out-dir es -s --ignore test --copy-files
scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es
scripts.clean:build: npm run clean:build:commonjs && npm run clean:build:es
scripts.clean: npm run clean:build && npm run clean:static
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build --production
scripts.start: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es webpack-dev-server --config sandbox/webpack.config.js --content-base sandbox --host 0.0.0.0 --history-api-fallback true --hot true
